casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Griffis, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Griffis, 132 Ohio St.3d 88, 2012-Ohio-2201.]

(No. 2011-1194 Submitted May 9, 2012 Decided May 23, 2012.) Timothy Young, Ohio Public Defender, and Peter Galyardt, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The cause is dismissed as having been improvidently accepted. Appellant’s motion to vacate stay of briefing is denied as moot.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. Lanzinger, J., dissents.
